title: AWS Infrastructure Automation to Azure ARM: Deployment, Provisioning, and Infrastructure as Code
description: Master infrastructure automation by implementing AWS CloudFormation and Systems Manager automation, then migrating to Azure Resource Manager and Automation equivalents with Infrastructure as Code, configuration management, and operational automation.
learningObjectives: Implement Infrastructure as Code using AWS CloudFormation and Azure ARM templates
Build configuration management solutions with AWS Systems Manager and Azure Automation
Create automated provisioning workflows for complex infrastructure deployments
Design immutable infrastructure patterns and blue-green deployment strategies
Implement compliance automation and drift detection across both platforms
Build self-service infrastructure provisioning with governance controls
prerequisites: Completion of SOA-C02 Monitoring and Reliability labs
Understanding of infrastructure components and networking
Basic knowledge of YAML, JSON, and scripting languages
Familiarity with version control systems and CI/CD concepts
businessScenario: AutoOps Industries needs to modernize their infrastructure provisioning from manual processes to fully automated Infrastructure as Code. They require consistent, repeatable deployments across development, staging, and production environments on both AWS and Azure platforms. The operations team must implement governance controls, compliance automation, and self-service capabilities while maintaining security and cost optimization.

troubleshooting.issue: Complex template dependencies causing deployment failures and circular references
troubleshooting.solution: Design proper template hierarchy, use nested templates judiciously, implement dependency mapping, use cross-stack references appropriately, and test templates in isolation

troubleshooting.issue: Configuration drift causing inconsistent environments and security vulnerabilities
troubleshooting.solution: Implement continuous compliance monitoring, use immutable infrastructure patterns, automate drift detection and remediation, and implement proper change management procedures

troubleshooting.issue: Deployment automation causing downtime and rollback complexity
troubleshooting.solution: Implement blue-green deployments, use health checks and validation gates, implement automated rollback procedures, and test deployment strategies thoroughly
